metadata.feature_description: Search, sort, and paginate through influence goals with configurable page sizes and multi-column sorting.

steps.action: Navigate to Community Settings > Influence tab
steps.expected: Influence goals table displayed with search box
steps.actual: Influence goals table displayed with search box showing 13 items

steps.expected: Table filters to show only goals containing 'logins' (should show 'Number of logins' only)
steps.actual: Table still shows all 13 items - no filtering applied despite search term being entered

issues: Search/filter functionality does not filter the influence goals table. Entering search terms has no effect on displayed results.

steps.expected: Table shows empty state with message indicating no matching results
steps.actual: Table still shows all 13 items - search does not filter results

issues: Cannot test empty search results because search functionality does not filter data at all

steps.expected: Table sorted by Weight in ascending order
steps.actual: Table sorted by Weight ascending: 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 4, 8, 10. Sort indicator arrow shown on Weight column.

steps.action: Click on Weight column header again
steps.expected: Table sorted by Weight in descending order
steps.actual: Table sorted by Weight descending: 30, 20, 10, 10, 8, 4, 2, 2, 1, 1. Sort indicator arrow shown pointing down.

steps.expected: Table sorted by Value in ascending order
steps.actual: Table sorted by Value ascending: 1, 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 10, 50, 100. Sort indicator arrow shown on Value column.
Successfully navigated to page 2. Shows 'Showing 11-13 of 13 items' and 'Page 2 of 2'. Three remaining items displayed.

steps.expected: Navigate back to page 1, showing items 1-10
steps.actual: Successfully navigated back to page 1. Shows 'Showing 1-10 of 13 items' and 'Page 1 of 2'. Ten items displayed.

observations: The search/filter functionality in the Influence tab does not work - entering any search term does not filter the displayed goals
The search appears to be wired up (500ms throttle delay exists in code) but the filtering does not take effect on the displayed data
It is possible the search filters on an internal GoalType field rather than the visible Title/description, but this could not be verified
Sorting functionality works correctly for Weight and Value columns with proper ascending/descending toggle
Pagination works correctly with Next/Prev buttons and proper display of item counts and page numbers
The code shows support for sorting by GoalType, Weight, Value, MinValue, and MaxValue columns, but UI only shows GoalType, Weight, and Value columns
Page size configuration (5, 10, 25, 50 items) exists in Miscellaneous Community Settings section, not directly in the Influence goals grid
